verb.description: Give a practical exhibition and explanation of (how a machine, skill, or craft works or is performed)
examples: computerized design methods will be demonstrated
he demonstrated how to make his favorite hotdog

verb.description: Clearly show the existence or truth of (something) by giving proof or evidence.
examples: their shameful silence demonstrates their ineptitude

verb.description: Take part in a public demonstration.
examples: thousands demonstrated in favor of the government

origin: Mid 16th century (in the sense point out): from Latin demonstrat- pointed out, from the verb demonstrare.
